component.name: VolcanoPlot
component.doc: Scatter plot of log2 fold-changes vs. p-values (aka "volcano plot").
component.author: Christian Frech

input.name: expr
input.doc: List of genes with log2 fold-changes and p-values as outputted by component DESeq2

input.name: geneNames
input.doc: CSV file providing gene names for labeling significant genes (optional). The first column is expected to contain gene identifiers identical to column one of input 'expr'. The column containing gene names can be specified via parameter.

parameter.name: lfcthresh
parameter.doc: Threshold log2 fold-change to consider genes as significantly differentially expressed.

parameter.name: sigthresh
parameter.doc: Threshold for q-value to consider genes as significantly differentially expressed.

parameter.name: fccol
parameter.doc: Number of column in expression input data containing log2 fold-changes.

parameter.name: pcol
parameter.doc: Number of column in expression input data containing p-values.

parameter.name: qcol
parameter.doc: Number of column in expression input data containing q-values.

parameter.name: geneNameCol
parameter.doc: Number of column of input 'geneNames' containing gene names used as labels.

parameter.name: labelTopN
parameter.doc: Label top N most significant genes. Set to 0 to disable. If enabled, alternative gene names can be provided with input port 'geneNames'. Otherwise, gene identifiers provided in expression input data will be used.

parameter.name: minP
parameter.doc: Minimum p-value. Smaller p-values are set to this minimum value to limit y-axis plot range.

parameter.name: sampleSize
parameter.doc: Maximum number of genes below 'lfcthresh' and 'sigthresh' thresholds that will be plotted. Used to reduce plot size.

parameter.name: sectionTitle
parameter.doc: Title of the LaTeX section or an empty string to omit the section

parameter.name: sectionType
parameter.doc: Type of LaTeX section: usually one of section, subsection or subsubsection. No section statement is written if sectionTitle is empty.
